issue.title: [C++] Add tests for RandomArrayGenerator
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11674](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11674). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
RandomArrayGenerator is currently untested, and has had some bugs in the past. We should add unit tests for it.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11674?focusedCommentId=17586028) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
